name: Kitten Chaos
description:
Kitten Chaos

A cute roguelike bullet hell where you have to feed cats and avoid being scratched up!

Controlls (Move left in the main menu to enter the tutorial!)

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Attack

C - Grappling hook

The Team!

TheRabidDuck1 - Music, Code, Design

SpaceDinosaur12 - Art, Code, Sound
